Title: Half Deaf Is Better Than All Dead
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper, David Schickler
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Lucas sets off an alarm while trying to steal a painting from the Harrisburg State Museum. He contacts Job to help him break out. After getting video proof that Proctor killed Hanson, Lucas arrests him. However, the Moody's get in the way.
